org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.mediation

Interface HL7Support


  • public interface HL7Support
    Supports the HL7 related transformations mediation and filtering
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message createAckResponse(Message msg)
      Creates the default ACK HL7 MLLP response message and binds that to the UltraESB message API to return a new response message that is understood by the UltraESB messaging API
      Message createErrorResponse(Message msg, java.lang.String ackStatus, int errorCode, java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Creates the default ERROR HL7 MLLP response message and binds that to the UltraESB message API to return a new response message that is understood by the UltraESB messaging API
      Message createErrorResponse(Message msg, java.lang.String ackStatus, java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Creates the default ERROR HL7 MLLP response message and binds that to the UltraESB message API to return a new response message that is understood by the UltraESB messaging API
      java.lang.String readPayloadAsString(Message msg)
      Reads the HL7 payload as a String

    • Method Detail

      • createAckResponse

        Message createAckResponse(Message msg)
        Creates the default ACK HL7 MLLP response message and binds that to the UltraESB message API to return a new response message that is understood by the UltraESB messaging API
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to which the ACK response to be created
        Returns:
        the generated response message having the HL7 ACK message embedded in it

      • createErrorResponse

        Message createErrorResponse(Message msg,
                          java.lang.String ackStatus,
                          java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Creates the default ERROR HL7 MLLP response message and binds that to the UltraESB message API to return a new response message that is understood by the UltraESB messaging API
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to which the ERROR response to be created
        ackStatus - the HL7 ACK status to be attached to the error response
        errorMessage - the error message detail to be attached to the error response
        Returns:
        the generated response message having the HL7 ERROR message embedded in it

      • createErrorResponse

        Message createErrorResponse(Message msg,
                          java.lang.String ackStatus,
                          int errorCode,
                          java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Creates the default ERROR HL7 MLLP response message and binds that to the UltraESB message API to return a new response message that is understood by the UltraESB messaging API
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to which the ERROR response to be created
        ackStatus - the HL7 ACK status to be attached to the error response
        errorCode - the error code causing this error
        errorMessage - the error message detail to be attached to the error response
        Returns:
        the generated response message having the HL7 ERROR message embedded in it

      • readPayloadAsString

        java.lang.String readPayloadAsString(Message msg)
        Reads the HL7 payload as a String
        Parameters:
        msg - the message of which the payload will be transformed into its String representation
        Returns:
        the string representation of the HL7 message payload embedded in the given message
